title: Longest Stun or similar CC duration in game?

replies.body: Morgana snare. 3 Seconds. find me something that lasts longer
Enchanted Crystal Arrow. 3.5 seconds of stun.
I can't, too busy having nightmares about Dark Binding's duration (and hitbox.)
on a 1.5 min cooldown, and only stunned for that long if hit at max range. Come at that morgana 3 second cooldown snare.
